//-----------------------------------------
//-- IMEM_0_bits.txt
//-- 
//-- The program to be loaded into the instruction memory, perhaps the operating system
//-- or a user-loaded program.The instructions are followed by two no-operations.
//-- This is necessary because of the pipelined architecture of the processor
//-- to guarantee the data delivery of the last instruction



//--  
//--  16-bit instruction  
//-- MSB....... LSB.......       16-bit
//-- Op   DR  SR1  i.. SR2       address    assembly code  semantics
//-- ---- --- ---- --- ---       --------   -------------  --------------
     1001_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0000:  NOT R0    R0
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0001:  NOP           
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0002:  NOP           
     0111_000_0_00_000_001  //-- 16'h0003:  STR    R0 R1      
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0004:  NOP           
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0005:  NOP           
     0110_010_0_00_000_001  //-- 16'h0006:  LDR R2    R1
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0007:  NOP           
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0008:  NOP           
     0101_011_0_10_000_000  //-- 16'h0009:  AND R3 R2 R0
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h000A:  NOP           
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h000B:  NOP           
     0101_000_0_00_000_001  //-- 16'h000C:  AND R0 R0 R1
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h000D:  NOP           
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h000E:  NOP           
     0101_010_0_10_000_011  //-- 16'h000F:  AND R2 R2 R3
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0010:  NOP           
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0011:  NOP           
     0111_000_0_00_000_111  //-- 16'h0012:  STR    R0 R7
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0013:  NOP           
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0014:  NOP           
     0110_110_0_00_000_111  //-- 16'h0015:  LDR R7    R6
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0016:  NOP           
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0017:  NOP           
     0101_110_1_10_000_111  //-- 16'h0018:  AND R6 R6 R7
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h0019:  NOP           
     0000_000_0_00_000_000  //-- 16'h001A:  NOP           
0000_0000_0000_0000
0000_0000_0000_0000
0000_0000_0000_0000
0000_0000_0000_0000
